metadata.title: CVE-2020-5253 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: NetHack before version 3.6.0 allowed malicious use of escaping ofcharacters in the configuration file (usually .nethackrc) which could beexploited. This bug is patched in NetHack 3.6.0.

criterions.comment: nethack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
